column3: Latest;Phnom Penh: A young man set himself on fire in a suicide bidpeople and authority but failed after people put out the flames.------The incident happened at 1:23 pm on September 11
column4: 2019 near Koh Pich Bridge in Tonle Bassac District. Phnom Penh Chamkar Mon.------Witnesses said that before the incident
column5: the young man named Pheu Touch from Anlong Commune
column8: stopped near the Koh Pich Bridge and suddenly doused himself and went up in flames. People rushed to save him and he was sent to hospital.------The reason for the incident is unknown. ------Kampuchea Thmey
